QuestData.Title: Libram of Constitution
QuestData.CompletionText: There is a price to pay for all things in this world. The price for the specific item that you seek is thirty gold pieces.$B$BNaturally, I shall retain the majority of the components which you collected. But worry not, you shall have your trinket.
QuestData.RewardText: It is disgrace to his memory... a mortal, such as yourself, finishing his life's work.$B$BTake your amalgamation and be gone!
